Package com.github.stasgora.observetree

Class ListenerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.stasgora.observetree.ListenerManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Observable
    public abstract class ListenerManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class providing add and remove methods for ChangeListener and ListenerManager parents and children
    Author:
    Stanisław Góra
    See Also:
    Observable
